content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) storing extracted coal

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) storing extracted iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-64.5) transferring items from the furnace to the chest

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) extracting copper ore
- Transport Belt group connecting the mining drill to other parts of the facility

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) transferring items into the chest

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of multiple belt groups facilitating the movement of resources between different facilities:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions, including (x=-26.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-24.5, y=-65.5) and others, ensuring efficient resource transport

## ERROR TIPS

### Undefined Entity Error
- Ensure that all entities used in the code are properly defined and imported. The error "NameError: name 'Chest' is not defined" suggests that the 'Chest' entity was not recognized. Verify that the correct module or class is imported and used.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing
